reviews.review:
just one word : perfect
edit : after almost 1k hours of dbd I regret buying it bc of solo queue teammates leaving me on the hook after I loop the killer for 5 gens too much time, if you see your favorite streamer like Otz or Noob3 (rip) playing a good fluid chill game, you need a good pc, dont be scared and learn really quick how to loop, you can fail it's ok but try a least. I still love dbd, when I'm not against campy killer, or paired with SWF bully squad, idc with being paired with new players even if that piss me off that they're too scared to get me off the hook, just the SWF bully squad made me angry, oh and another point to fix      cheaters. thx have a great day

Do you wanna be disappointed every time you play a game? Do you like toxicity at it's finest? Do you wanna feel depressed and are tired of games that are rewarding and make you feel accomplished, entertained and happy? Welcome to dbd, the game that wants you to bend over so it can rob you of your money, your joy and your dignity. Wait for a 95% off sale before you do it, trust me.
You ever wanna kill people in the woods.....yeah me neither

Probably the best online - hide and seek/horror game of all time. Highly recommend playing for getting many great emotions and blood on your screen.
great game i like to kill and it fun to kill it shows how easy i can do it!!

Fun game, the community has a reputation for being toxic. Don't believe it; that notion is false. I have met so many more people who are nice and welcoming than those who are toxic. This community is amazing and I love the people I have met while playing this game. The devs kinda suck at balancing, but their art team is amazing. The overall game mechanics are super fun and if you love horror games, I highly recommend this game. It's not scary after you put in 50-100 hours but the game is still super fun and super enjoyable after that. Putting time into this game feels worthwhile and rewarding. I just love this game and if you're on the fence about getting it, then I cannot recommend it enough.

This game has it's fun and unfun times. If you are from South-Africa it's going to be mostly unfun no matter which side you play. The devs don't care about South-Africa enough to give us our own servers, they only want our money. Playing on average 200 ms ping means this game is basically broken. You can't even have a custom match with only friends because even those lobbies have high ping. The devs also have absolutely no idea what they are doing when it comes to balancing so the game is highly survivor sided especially with the damage rollback feature. Its not like this game came out yesterday so there really is no excuse.


This game is only tolerable if played with friends that have also been suckered into getting it.
Made me feel scared, the difficulty increased, thrilling hide and seek.

Balance is the issue and always will be, I don't foresee a lot of the problems being fixed in this game.

Every perk that makes a Survivor good usually comes with a draw back like exhaustion rather than just a cool down so you can't loop a killer forever but then at the same time, why is it not the killers fault for focusing that hard on a lost cause? just chase another survivor if you can't catch them?

On the other hand all the killers have perks with really great benefits or abilities that make them usually over powered, such as a cleaving one shot chain saw from leather face which makes for a great face camping tool at a hook, or a crap ton of teleport killers that bypass the point of the heart beat system in play, spirit being the most dumb one unless you hard counter her with a perk that muffles groans from being hit and even then a good spirit player will just listen for some grass moving or a crow so that's a bust too.

Rant aside, game is trash and will make you hate yourself the more you try to go for that rank 1 survivor, and the only one truly having fun is the killer unless you get a "special" killer that actually falls for jukes and can be looped.

Save your time and life.
Uma merda, era melhor eu ter gasto com o onlyfans da belle delphine
